text: Agdistis ingens is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from southern Russia, China (Gansu), Mongolia, Tadzhikistan, Kirghistan, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Turkmenistan and Afghanistan.A taxonomic study of the genus Agdistis Hubner, [1825] 1816 from China, with description of one new species (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) The wingspan is 32–35 mm.Die palaearktischen Agdistis -Arten (Lepidoptera, Pterophoridae) ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths described in 1887
title: Agdistis ingens
